name: Child Phobia: Nightcoming Fears
description:
EARLY ACCESS - get the game with discount now, help us to improve the game! Write down comments and reviews, advices and critics!

"Child Phobia: Nightcoming Fears" is a 2D psychological thriller, horror.

We will tell you a story about a little boy, that has problem in family – and this problem converts in fear during the night. You will be able to explore various locations during the nightmares, and watch the family drama during the day.

Features:
  • Beautiful hand drawn scenes and environments!
  • Find and use items to overcome obstacles.
  • Intense gameplay.
  • Amazing, well-written story.
  • Moral choices and plot twists.
  • Hide from monsters and creatures.
You will have to face some moral choices, and the final ending fully depends on your decisions. Gameplay is non-linear, story has some branches and story lines.
